MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA17 postcode area of Darvel. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 3.27pm. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of an overhead line fault and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:16pm on 15th January 2021.
